name: mionions 2
description:
Created in 10 days for the "Unnecessary Sequels" Awful Summer Jam.

Uses Unity's built-in FPS controller and voiceovers done by friends but everything else was created completely from scratch for this project by me.

Not as polished as I would have liked but like I said, 10 days.

Let me know on Twitter what you thought! @SchaefferAustin

Known Issues
  • Hit detection fails at lower framerates
  • Occasional bugs when using Master Volume option to lower volume
